name: Maui Magic
description: How often do you get an opportunity to take a vacation to one of the most beautiful places in the world and be supported to tap into the wonders and magic available for healing, transforming, and sacred play, that has depth, nourishment on all levels, and is customized to your own ongoing journey with expert practitioners at your fingertips to support you? If you are looking for a place to rent while here, let us offer the perfect, peaceful vacation rental next to the grandest beach on Maui, conveniently located to our beloved town Paia with shops, restaurants, and windsurfing.
